```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(spotifyr)
library(compmus)
chase_atlantic <-
  bind_rows(
    corpus_nostalgia |> mutate(category = "corpus_nostalgia"),
    corpus_chaseatlantic |> mutate(category = "corpus_chaseatlantic")
  )
corpus_nostalgia |> ggplot(aes(x = energy)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.1)
corpus_chaseatlantic |> ggplot(aes(x = energy)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.1)
```
